titles: A discourse of the vsage of the English fugitiues, by the Spaniard
author: Lewkenor, Lewis, Sir, d. 1626.
Wadsworth, James, 1572?-1623, attributed name.
Scarlett, Thomas, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Scarlet for Iohn Drawater, and are to be solld at his shop in Pater noster row, at the signe of the Swan,
notes: Sometimes wrongly attributed to James Wadsworth and to Thomas Scarlett.
This edition was printed without author's permission--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
keywords: Religious refugees --  Spain --  Early works to 1800.
